steps.title: Draw a circle and an oblong below that overlaps the circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle and an oblong below that overlaps the circle.

steps.title: Add a small circle on the left side of the drawing for the head and sketch the neck using curved lines that connect to the body.
steps.content: Add a small circle on the left side of the drawing for the head and sketch the neck using curved lines that connect to the body.

steps.title: Draw the turtle’s feet using rectangular shapes.
steps.content: Draw the turtle’s feet using rectangular shapes.

steps.title: Draw the eyes using a small circle and curved lines for the eyebrows.
steps.content: Draw the eyes using a small circle and curved lines for the eyebrows. Add a curved line for the mouth.

steps.title: Draw the turtle’s shell from the circle you have drawn earlier.
steps.content: Draw the turtle’s shell from the circle you have drawn earlier.

steps.title: Sketch out the body and the legs from the outline.
steps.content: Sketch out the body and the legs from the outline.

steps.title: Draw a pattern for the turtle’s shell using squares and curves.
steps.content: Draw a pattern for the turtle’s shell using squares and curves.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw an oblong for the body.
steps.content: Draw an oblong for the body. Add a small circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw the legs using a curved rectangle-like shape.
steps.content: Draw the legs using a curved rectangle-like shape.

steps.title: Draw the turtle’s shell from the outline.
steps.content: Draw the turtle’s shell from the outline.

steps.title: Draw a series of hexagon shapes as part of the shell’s pattern.
steps.content: Draw a series of hexagon shapes as part of the shell’s pattern.

steps.title: Finish the pattern of the shell by adding a series of lines.
steps.content: Finish the pattern of the shell by adding a series of lines.

steps.title: Draw the head and the eyes.
steps.content: Draw the head and the eyes. For the eyes, draw a small circle. Inside it, add two curved lines and a smaller circle for the pupils.

steps.title: Sketch out the legs from the pattern you made earlier.
steps.content: Sketch out the legs from the pattern you made earlier.

steps.title: Sketch out small square patterns on the turtle’s body.
steps.content: Sketch out small square patterns on the turtle’s body.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw an oval with a sharp edge on the left for the head.
steps.content: Draw an oval with a sharp edge on the left for the head.

steps.title: Draw a big oval for the body and shell.
steps.content: Draw a big oval for the body and shell.

steps.title: Draw a curve inside the big oval.
steps.content: Draw a curve inside the big oval.

steps.title: Draw three oblongs attached to the body for the feet.
steps.content: Draw three oblongs attached to the body for the feet.

steps.title: Based on the outline, darken the necessary lines and add the eyes and mouth of the turtle.
steps.content: Based on the outline, darken the necessary lines and add the eyes and mouth of the turtle.

steps.title: Add details to your turtle such as stripes and shell pattern.
steps.content: Add details to your turtle such as stripes and shell pattern.

steps.title: Erase all the unwanted unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase all the unwanted unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your turtle!
steps.content: Color your turtle!

steps.title: Draw a big oval for the shell and body of the turtle.
steps.content: Draw a big oval for the shell and body of the turtle.

steps.title: Draw a semi-trapezoid shape beside the big oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw a semi-trapezoid shape beside the big oval for the head.

steps.title: Draw three rectangles below the shell.
steps.content: Draw three rectangles below the shell. Add small claws.

steps.title: Draw a big interconnected curve for the tail.
steps.content: Draw a big interconnected curve for the tail.

steps.title: Most snapping turtles have spiked shells; draw three series of spikes on the shell.
steps.content: Most snapping turtles have spiked shells; draw three series of spikes on the shell.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the whole body of the turtle.
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the whole body of the turtle. Add the eyes and mouth; add some wrinkles in completing the body of the turtle.

steps.title: Add details such as the shell pattern and skin texture.
steps.content: Add details such as the shell pattern and skin texture.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your snapping turtle!
steps.content: Color your snapping turtle!
